action.action-desc: Mr. Stanton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 40, United States Code, to grant the Supreme Court Police authority to protect the families of the justices, officers, and employees of the Supreme Court.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Supreme Court Families Security Act of 2022.
Section 6121(a)(2) of title 40, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

subparagraph.text: any member of the immediate family of any such justice, officer, or employee if the Marshal determines such protection to be necessary.
